message: Hey Morgan, thanks for joining today. To kick things off, can you tell me a little about yourself and your background?

Sure, happy to be here. I am a graphic designer with experience across print and digital work, and I really enjoy creating clean, engaging visuals. I have worked with different teams and projects, which has helped me build a solid and well-rounded skill set.
Nice. What would you say are your main strengths as a designer?

I would say my main strengths are being organized, meeting deadlines, and adapting to different project needs. I am comfortable working independently or with a team, and I try to stay flexible and open to feedback.
Great. Can you share what kind of role or work environment you are looking for next?

I am looking for a creative role where I can continue to grow my skills and contribute to a collaborative team. Ideally it would be a place that values good design, communication, and steady professional development.
